section.description: To create a multi-line, word-wrapped text box control, you use the %M% format option. To create a multi-line, word-wrapped text box control that accepts the Enter key, use the %MW% formatting option. If you do not use the 'W' in the formatting string, the Enter key will select the default button on the dialog. The following dialog displays multi-line, word-wrapped text boxes, one of which accepts the Enter key to move to a new line.
